beolink_jid.name: Beolink JID
beolink_jid.description: Manually specify Beolink JID to join.

beolink_jids.name: Beolink JIDs
beolink_jids.description: Specify which Beolink JIDs will join current Beolink experience.

beolink_jids.name: Beolink JIDs
beolink_jids.description: Specify which Beolink JIDs will leave from current Beolink experience.

beolink_allstandby.name: Beolink allstandby
beolink_allstandby.description: Set all Connected Beolink devices to standby.

beolink_set_volume.name: Beolink set volume
beolink_set_volume.description: Set a volume level for all connected Beolink devices.

beolink_set_relative_volume.name: Beolink set relative volume
beolink_set_relative_volume.description: Set a volume level relative to the current level of all connected Beolink devices.

beolink_leader_command.name: Beolink leader command
beolink_leader_command.description: Send a media_player command to Beolink leader.

overlay_audio.name: Overlay audio
overlay_audio.description: Overlay audio over any currently playing audio. TTS is generated by Bang & Olufsen and is limited to 100 unique messages a day. Generated TTS messages are cached for 24 hours.

absolute_volume.name: Absolute volume
absolute_volume.description: Specify an absolute volume for the overlay.

volume_offset.name: Volume offset
volume_offset.description: Specify a volume offset to be added to the current volume level.

tts.name: Text to speech
tts.description: Specify a string to be converted to a TTS message.
